duties_responsibilities.duty: Support cost and schedule reduction activities for acquisition and development efforts.
Provide expert Program Management inputs to Request for Proposal (RFPs), including systems specs, Statement of Work (SOWs), and other RFP products.
Assist with planning, evaluating, and implementing program acquisition strategies, including risk assessment and realism in achieving product goals.
Prepare and review program documents in direct support of the acquisition program management functions, ensuring accuracy and consistency.
Provide non-technical acquisition program management, applying principles, criteria, and procedures of DoD Directives.
Assist with drafting contractual letters on program management issues, development of source selection strategies, and evaluation criteria.
Monitor interface control between IT systems and support mission execution, operational planning, and analysis.
Ensure that Mission Planning Environment systems are developed to meet operational requirements and expectations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in a related field
